subAudit.name: TechAndSociety
subAudit.description: Select one of the following: HU3701, HU3710, HU3810, MA4945, SS3510, SS3511, SS3520, SS3530, SS3580, SS3581, SS3630, SS3640, SS3800, SS3801

subAudit.name: LabScience
subAudit.description: Students must complete two science courses in two different disciplines (BL, CH, KIP, FW, GE, PH, SS) from the general education science course list; at least one of these must include or be taken with the accompanying laboratory. Find eligible courses on the General Education webpage

subAudit.name: ConcentrationRequirement
subAudit.description: CS 4000 - level, CS 4000 - level may be satisfied with, CS4099, MA 2160, MA 3000 - level

subAudit.name: TechElectives
subAudit.description: See academic advisor for a list of approved technical electives to choose from. Note: Technical electives plus the two 4000 - level CS courses must total 15 credits.

subAudit.name: FreeElectives
subAudit.description: Any coursework is allowable, excluding co-curricular and coursework below the 1000- level.
